content: Goracle (GORA) decentralized oracle networkBlockchains are walled off from the outside world. To build decentralized applications that make use of real world data, these apps need an Oracle that matches the security properties of a blockchain. ‚Äç That's where Goracle comes in - using Proof Of Stake to match the security and speed, of its underlying blockchain. Decentralized applications are no longer limited in what they can build!Goracle presale details can be found here : https://icogems.com/ico/Goracle
